title: Franchise value of the Boston Red Sox 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2003 to 2005, roughly increasing from 2005 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2011, rapidly increasing from 2011 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, about 2800.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars about 488.0 was reached at Year 2003
